title: Galaxy Z Fold 4 will reportedly pick up the 108MP camera from Galaxy S22 Ultra [U]
content:
Samsung’s foldable lineup has grown a lot over the past few years, with the third time truly being the charm. However, there’s a lot to get excited about with the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 4, and it seems that includes a big camera update, as well as hinge tweaks.

more…

The post Galaxy Z Fold 4 will reportedly pick up the 108MP camera from Galaxy S22 Ultra [U] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a pair of new reports, Samsung will finally bring a meaningful camera update to the Galaxy Z Fold 4, and maybe a new hinge too.
